description: This table extracts the related table Task Log: Instant (I LTK 81900), which contains the log of actions that happened on a task.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the task record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TASK_LOG_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant in UTC the action was done.

columns.name: TASK_LOG_ACTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of action logged.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


System Action


User Action

columns.name: TASK_LOG_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action that was done on the task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Added


Removed


Forward Scheduled


Paused


Resumed


Details Edited


Mark Resume After Discharge


Mark Not Resumed After Discharge


Schedule Updated


Instances Cleaned Up


Time Zone Changed

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The MyChart user (WPR) who did the action.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The new display when the display name (LTK-41) is changed.

columns.name: TASK_DESC
columns.description: The new description when the description (LTK-42) is changed.

columns.name: FREQ_ID
columns.description: The new frequency record when the frequency (LTK-300) is changed.

columns.name: FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: TASK_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The new start instant when the start date (LTK-540) is changed.

columns.name: TASK_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The new end instant when the end date (LTK-550) or duration (LTK-556) is changed.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The new goal record when the goal (LTK-220) is changed.

columns.name: TASK_START_TIME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The new start type when the start type (LTK-270) is changed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Source


Now


On a Specific Date


Pend For Later

columns.name: TASK_START_OFFSET_DAYS
columns.description: The new start offset days when the start offset days (I LTK 580) is changed.

columns.name: TASK_START_OFFSET_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The new start offset type when the start offset type (LTK-581) is changed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Before


After

columns.name: DURATION_DAYS
columns.description: The new duration in days when the duration (LTK-556) is changed.

columns.name: DAYS_AFTER_DISCHARGE
columns.description: The new days after discharge when the days after discharge (LTK-81051) is changed.

columns.name: SCHEDULE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The new schedule status when the schedule status (LTK-81011) is changed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Scheduled


Not Scheduled


Will Be Scheduled

columns.name: FLO_THRESHOLD_VALUE
columns.description: The new flowsheet threshold value when the flowsheet threshold value (LTK-43) is changed.
